fileSamples.statement:
(f : actid) (ordf : mode) (thread : BinNums.positive) (TID : tid f = thread) (RELCOV : W ∩₁ Rel ∩₁ issued T ⊆₁ covered T) (NEXT : next G (covered T) f) (FPARAMS : lab f = Afence ordf) (SC : Sc f) (Wf_sc : wf_sc G sc) (Csc : coh_sc G sc) (Comp : complete G) (Cint : coherence G) (Cext : acyc_ext G sc) (Cat : rmw_atomicity G) : forall l : location,
S_tm G l (covered T ∪₁ eq f)
≡₁ S_tm G l (covered T) ∪₁ t_acq G sc thread l (covered T).
fileSamples.conclusion:
forall l : location,
S_tm G l (covered T ∪₁ eq f)
≡₁ S_tm G l (covered T) ∪₁ t_acq G sc thread l (covered T)
fileSamples.hypotheses: (f : actid) (ordf : mode) (thread : BinNums.positive) (TID : tid f = thread) (RELCOV : W ∩₁ Rel ∩₁ issued T ⊆₁ covered T) (NEXT : next G (covered T) f) (FPARAMS : lab f = Afence ordf) (SC : Sc f) (Wf_sc : wf_sc G sc) (Csc : coh_sc G sc) (Comp : complete G) (Cint : coherence G) (Cext : acyc_ext G sc) (Cat : rmw_atomicity G)
fileSamples.proofString:
intro l; split.
unfold S_tm, t_acq.
rewrite s_tmr_union; relsf; unionL; splits; [basic_solver|].
unionR right.
rewrite (s_tmr_helper _ _ WF).
unfold c_acq, urr.
arewrite (sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ ⦗eq f⦘ ⊆ ⦗covered T⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗eq f⦘).
by revert NEXT; unfold next, dom_cond; basic_solver 21.
arewrite (⦗covered T⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗eq f⦘ ⊆ ⦗Tid_ thread ∪₁ Init⦘ ⨾ ⦗covered T⦘ ⨾ sb^?).
by unfolder; ins; desf; splits; eauto using sb_tid_init.
basic_solver 42.
unionL; [by unfold S_tm; rewrite s_tmr_union; basic_solver|].
unfold t_acq, S_tm.
rewrite s_tmr_union.
relsf.
unfold c_acq, urr.
rewrite (crE sc); relsf; unionL; splits.
unionR right.
rewrite (s_tmr_helper _ _ WF).
arewrite (⦗Tid_ thread ∪₁ Init⦘ ⨾ ⦗covered T⦘ ⊆ ⦗dom_rel(sb ⨾ ⦗eq f⦘)⦘).
rewrite <- TID; rewrite next_helper'; eauto.
basic_solver.
arewrite (⦗eq f⦘ ⊆ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ ⦗eq f⦘) at 1 by type_solver.
basic_solver 42.
arewrite (⦗Tid_ thread ∪₁ Init⦘ ⨾ ⦗covered T⦘ ⊆ ⦗covered T⦘ ⨾ ⦗Tid_ thread ∪₁ Init⦘).
basic_solver.
arewrite ((release ⨾ rf)^? ⨾ ⦗covered T⦘ ⊆ ⦗covered T⦘ ⨾ (release ⨾ rf)^?).
by case_refl _;      [basic_solver| rewrite !seqA; rewrite release_rf_covered; auto; basic_solver].
arewrite (hb^? ⨾ ⦗covered T⦘ ⊆ ⦗covered T⦘ ⨾ hb^?).
by case_refl _; [basic_solver| rewrite hb_covered; auto; basic_solver].
arewrite (⦗W_ l⦘ ⨾ rf^? ⨾ (hb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘)^? ⨾ sc ⊆ ⦗W_ l⦘ ⨾ rf^? ⨾ hb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ sc).
rewrite (dom_l (@wf_scD G sc Wf_sc)) at 1; rewrite (dom_r (wf_rfD WF)) at 1; hahn_frame_r; type_solver 42.
arewrite (sc ⨾ ⦗covered T⦘ ⊆ ⦗covered T⦘ ⨾ sc).
now eapply sc_covered; eauto.
unfold S_tmr; basic_solver 21.

fileSamples.statement:
(f : actid) (FENCE : F f) (COV : coverable G sc T f) (NCOV : ~ covered T f) (H : is_sc lab f = false) : forall l l' : location,
t_rel G sc (tid f) l l' (covered T ∪₁ eq f)
∪₁ (if LocSet.Facts.eq_dec l l'
    then W_ l' ∩₁ Tid_ (tid f) ∩₁ (covered T ∪₁ eq f)
    else ∅)
≡₁ (if is_acqrel lab f
    then t_acq G sc (tid f) l (covered T)
    else
     if is_rel lab f
     then t_cur G sc (tid f) l (covered T)
     else
      t_rel G sc (tid f) l l' (covered T)
      ∪₁ (if LocSet.Facts.eq_dec l l'
          then W_ l' ∩₁ Tid_ (tid f) ∩₁ covered T
          else ∅)).
fileSamples.conclusion:
forall l l' : location,
t_rel G sc (tid f) l l' (covered T ∪₁ eq f)
∪₁ (if LocSet.Facts.eq_dec l l'
    then W_ l' ∩₁ Tid_ (tid f) ∩₁ (covered T ∪₁ eq f)
    else ∅)
≡₁ (if is_acqrel lab f
    then t_acq G sc (tid f) l (covered T)
    else
     if is_rel lab f
     then t_cur G sc (tid f) l (covered T)
     else
      t_rel G sc (tid f) l l' (covered T)
      ∪₁ (if LocSet.Facts.eq_dec l l'
          then W_ l' ∩₁ Tid_ (tid f) ∩₁ covered T
          else ∅))
